headline: NVIDIA Corporation declares dividend

headline: NVIDIA Q1 earnings per share $0.33
description: Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>: Nvidia announces financial results for first quarter fiscal 2017 . Q1 non-gaap earnings per share $0.46 . Q1 gaap earnings per share $0.33 . Q1 revenue $1.3 billion versus i/b/e/s view $1.26 billion . Q1 earnings per share view $0.32 -- Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S . Qtrly gaap gross margin 57.5 percent versus 56.7 percent last year . Nvidia corp says q2 revenue is expected to be $1.35 billion, plus or minus two percent . Q2 GAAP and non-GAAP gross margins are expected to be 57.7 percent and 58.0 percent, respectively, plus or minus 50 basis points . Q1 non-gaap gross margin 58.6 percent versus 56.9 percent . Gaap gross margins are expected to be 57.7 percent and 58.0 percent, respectively, plus or minus 50 basis points .For fiscal 2017, intends to return about $1.0 billion to shareholders through ongoing quarterly cash dividends and share repurchases.

headline: Nvidia Corp Qtrly Revenue Was $2.56 Bln
description: Nov 14 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE WAS $2.56 BILLION, DOWN 8 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER AND UP 22 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY.NVIDIA CORP QTRLY GAMING REVENUE WAS $1.66 BILLION, DOWN 6 PERCENT FROM A YEAR AGO AND UP 26 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY.NVIDIA CORP QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE WAS $162 MILLION, DOWN 6 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER AND DOWN 22 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY.NVIDIA CORP QTRLY DATA CENTER REVENUE WAS $726 MILLION, DOWN 8 PERCENT FROM A YEAR AGO AND UP 11 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY.

headline: Nvidia Sets Quarterly Cash Dividend Of $0.16/Share

headline: Nvidia Says Covid-19 Continues To Affect Business In Both Positive & Negative Ways
description: Nov 18 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP - COVID-19 CONTINUES TO AFFECT BUSINESS IN BOTH POSITIVE & NEGATIVE WAYS.NVIDIA CORP - GAMING AND DATA CENTER MARKET PLATFORMS HAVE BENEFITED FROM STRONGER DEMAND IN QUARTER AS PEOPLE CONTINUE TO WORK, LEARN, AND PLAY FROM HOME.NVIDIA CORP- QTRLY GAMING REVENUE INCREASES REFLECT HIGHER SALES ACROSS DESKTOP AND NOTEBOOK GAMING GPUS, AND GAME CONSOLE SOCS.NVIDIA CORP - BELIEVE CLOSING OF THE ARM ACQUISITION WILL LIKELY OCCUR IN FIRST QUARTER OF CALENDAR 2022.

headline: UK's CMA Says NVIDIA/Arm Merger Should Be Progressed To Phase 2 Probe
description: Aug 20 (Reuters) - Competition and Markets Authority::COMPETITION AND MKTS  - NVIDIA/ARM MERGER UPDATE.CMA FINDS COMPETITION CONCERNS WITH NVIDIA'S PURCHASE OF ARM.CMA - SHOULD DEAL GO AHEAD, CMA IS CONCERNED THAT MERGED BUSINESS WOULD HAVE ABILITY AND INCENTIVE TO HARM COMPETITIVENESS OF NVIDIA'S RIVALS.COMPETITION AND MARKETS AUTHORITY: FOUND THAT NVIDIA'S PURCHASE OF ARM RAISES SERIOUS COMPETITION CONCERNS.CMA: FOUND THAT MERGER SHOULD BE PROGRESSED TO AN IN-DEPTH PHASE 2 INVESTIGATION ON COMPETITION GROUNDS.CMA - IN CONDUCTING ITS INVESTIGATION, CMA HAS WORKED CLOSELY WITH OTHER COMPETITION AUTHORITIES AROUND WORLD TO CAREFULLY CONSIDER IMPACT OF DEAL..CMA: SOS TO DECIDE WHETHER DEAL BE REFERRED FOR PHASE 2 PROBE ON BOTH COMPETITION & NATIONAL SECURITY GROUNDS/PASSED BACK TO CMA TO PROBE ON COMPETITION GROUNDS ONLY.

headline: Nvidia Corp - Our Gpus Are Capable Of Cryptocurrency Mining, Though We Have Limited Visibility Into How Much This Impacts Our Overall Gpu Demand
description: May 25 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP - OUR GPUS ARE CAPABLE OF CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING, THOUGH WE HAVE LIMITED VISIBILITY INTO HOW MUCH THIS IMPACTS OUR OVERALL GPU DEMAND.NVIDIA CORP - YEAR-ON-YEAR DECREASE IN AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE  WAS DUE TO AUTOMAKERS’ SUPPLY CONSTRAINTS AND THE DECLINE OF LEGACY COCKPIT REVENUE.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY OEM AND OTHER REVENUE DECREASE DUE TO DECLINE IN CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING PROCESSOR REVENUE, WHICH WAS NOMINAL IN QUARTER VERSUS $155 MILLION A YEAR AGO.Further company coverage: NVDA.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Nvidia Announces Preliminary Financial Results For Second Quarter Fiscal 2023
description: Aug 8 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2023.Q2 REVENUE $6.7 BILLION.Q2 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $6.70 BILLION, DOWN 19% SEQUENTIALLY AND UP 3% FROM PRIOR YEAR.Q2 RESULTS ARE EXPECTED TO INCLUDE APPROXIMATELY $1.32 BILLION OF CHARGES.$1.32 BILLION OF CHARGES, PRIMARILY FOR INVENTORY AND RELATED RESERVES, BASED ON REVISED EXPECTATIONS OF FUTURE DEMAND.Q2 GAMING REVENUE WAS $2.04 BILLION, DOWN 44% SEQUENTIALLY AND DOWN 33% FROM PRIOR YEAR.Q2 DATA CENTER REVENUE, THOUGH A RECORD, WAS SOMEWHAT SHORT OF CO'S EXPECTATIONS, AS IT WAS IMPACTED BY SUPPLY CHAIN DISRUPTIONS.BELIEVE OUR LONG-TERM GROSS MARGIN PROFILE IS INTACT.PLAN TO CONTINUE STOCK BUYBACKS AS WE FORESEE STRONG CASH GENERATION AND FUTURE GROWTH.IN QUARTER, IMPLEMENTED PRICING PROGRAMS WITH CHANNEL PARTNERS TO REFLECT CHALLENGING MARKET CONDITIONS THAT ARE EXPECTED TO PERSIST INTO Q3.Q2 REVENUE VIEW $8.10 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

headline: Nvidia Says New Licensing Requirement May Have A Disproportionate Impact On Co And May Disadvantage Nvidia Against Competitors - SEC Filing
description: Aug 31 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA SAYS NEW LICENSING REQUIREMENT MAY HAVE A DISPROPORTIONATE IMPACT ON NVIDIA AND MAY DISADVANTAGE NVIDIA AGAINST COMPETITORS - SEC FILING.NVIDIA SAYS FUTURE REVENUE AND PROFITABILITY MAY BE SUBSTANTIALLY REDUCED RELATIVE TO Q3 CHINA SALES OUTLOOK, & CO'S COMPETITIVE POSITION MAY BE HARMED.NVIDIA SAYS EVEN IF USG GRANTS REQUESTED LICENSES, THE NEW LICENSE REQUIREMENT MAY BENEFIT OUR COMPETITORS.Further company coverage: NVDA.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: NVIDIA Corp Says Sequential Growth In Q3 Data Center Revenue Was Impacted By Softness In China
description: Nov 16 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP - SEQUENTIAL GROWTH IN Q3 DATA CENTER REVENUE WAS IMPACTED BY SOFTNESS IN CHINA.NVIDIA - BELIEVE RECENT TRANSITION IN VERIFYING ETHEREUM CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS FROM PROOF-OF-WORK TO PROOF-OF-STAKE HAS REDUCED UTILITY OF GPUS FOR CRYPTO MINING.NVIDIA - CERTAIN EXPORT RESTRICTIONS TO CHINA IMPACTED Q3 REVENUE, WITH DECLINE LARGELY OFFSET BY SALES OF ALTERNATIVE PRODUCTS INTO CHINA.NVIDIA CORP - Q4 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $500 MILLION TO $550 MILLION.Further company coverage: NVDA.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Nvidia Says US Govt Told Licensing Requirements From Implementation Of Additional Export Controls On Some Semiconductors Effective Immediately
description: Oct 24 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA : US GOVERNMENT TOLD CO LICENSING REQUIREMENTS FROM IMPLEMENTATION OF ADDITIONAL EXPORT CONTROLS ON SOME SEMICONDUCTORS EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY.NVIDIA CORP- DOES NOT ANTICIPATE THAT ACCELERATED TIMING OF LICENSING REQUIREMENTS WILL HAVE A NEAR-TERM MEANINGFUL IMPACT ON ITS FINANCIAL RESULTS.NVIDIA CORP: INTERIM FINAL RULE TO IMPACT SHIPMENTS OF COMPANY'S A100, A800, H100, H800, AND L40S PRODUCTS.Further company coverage: NVDA.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Nvidia Corp- Licensing Requirements Did Not Have A Meaningful Impact On Our Revenue In The Third Quarter Of Fiscal 2024
description: Nov 21 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP-  LICENSING REQUIREMENTS DID NOT HAVE A MEANINGFUL IMPACT ON OUR REVENUE IN THE THIRD QUARTER OF FISCAL 2024.NVIDIA CORP- IN THE THIRD QUARTER OF FISCAL 2024, PROVISIONS FOR INVENTORY AND RELATED CHARGES WERE $681 MILLION.NVIDIA CORP- IN THE THIRD QUARTER OF FISCAL 2023, PROVISIONS FOR INVENTORY AND RELATED CHARGES WERE $702 MILLION.NVIDIA CORP: EXPECT THAT SALES TO CHINA AND COUNTRY GROUPS D1, D4, AND D5 GROUPS WILL DECLINE SIGNIFICANTLY IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF FISCAL 2024.NVIDIA CORP- "MONITORING THE IMPACT OF THE GEOPOLITICAL CONFLICT IN AND AROUND ISRAEL ON OUR OPERATIONS".NVIDIA CORP: HAS APPROXIMATELY 3,400 EMPLOYEES IN ISRAEL.NVIDIA CORP: INVENTORY WAS $4.78 BILLION WITH DAYS SALES OF INVENTORY (DSI) OF 92 IN QUARTER - CFO COMMENTS.Further company coverage: NVDA.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Nvidia Corp Qtrly GPU Business Revenue Was $2.46 Bln, Up 33 Pct From Year Earlier
description: Feb 8 (Reuters) - Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE WAS $2.46 BILLION, UP 33 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER.NVIDIA CORP -  RECORDED A U.S. TAX REFORM PROVISIONAL NET TAX BENEFIT OF $133 MILLION, OR $0.21 PER DILUTED SHARE IN QTR‍​‍​.NVIDIA CORP - OVERALL, THE LOWER-THAN-EXPECTED TAX RATE CONTRIBUTED $0.36 TO GAAP EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE IN QTR‍​.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE OF $132 MILLION, WHICH WAS UP 3 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER.NVIDIA CORP - INVENTORY AT THE END OF THE QUARTER WAS $796 MILLION, DOWN FROM $857 MILLION IN THE PRIOR QUARTER.NVIDIA CORP - Q1 FISCAL 2019 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $100 MILLION TO $120 MILLION.

headline: NVIDIA Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.98
description: May 10 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2019.Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.98.Q1 REVENUE $3.21 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.91 BILLION.Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.05.Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.47 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S.QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN OF 64.5 PERCENT VERSUS 61.9 PERCENT REPORTED IN Q4 2018.Q2 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $3.10 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS TWO PERCENT.QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN OF 64.7 PERCENT VERSUS 62.1 PERCENT REPORTED IN Q4 2018.QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE GREW 4 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER TO A RECORD $145 MILLION.Q2  GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 63.3 PERCENT AND 63.5 PERCENT, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS.QTRLY DATACENTER REVENUE GREW 71 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER TO $701 MILLION.QTRLY GAMING REVENUE GREW 68 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER TO $1.72 BILLION.

headline: Nvidia Now Projecting No Contributions From Cryptocurrency Going Forward
description: Aug 16 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP - PREVIOUSLY ANTICIPATED CRYPTOCURRENCY TO BE MEANINGFUL FOR THE YEAR, NOW PROJECTING NO CONTRIBUTIONS GOING FORWARD.NVIDIA CORP - ACTUAL CRYPTO-SPECIFIC PRODUCT REVENUE WAS $18 MILLION IN QUARTER - SEC FILING.

headline: Nvidia Now Projecting No Contributions From Cryptocurrency Going Forward

headline: Nvidia Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.76
description: Aug 16 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2019.Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.94.Q2 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.76.Q2 REVENUE $3.12 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $3.1 BILLION.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.66 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S.FOR FISCAL 2019, NVIDIA INTENDS TO RETURN $1.25 BILLION TO SHAREHOLDERS.REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $3.25 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS TWO PERCENT FOR Q3.GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 62.6 PERCENT AND 62.8 PERCENT, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS FOR Q3.GAAP AND NON-GAAP OPERATING EXPENSES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $870 MILLION AND $730 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY FOR Q3.QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN 63.3% VERSUS 58.4%.WILL PAY ITS NEXT QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.15 PER SHARE ON SEPTEMBER 21, 2018.QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 63.5% VERSUS 58.6%.QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE $2,656 MILLION VERSUS $1,897 MILLION.QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE $161 MILLION VERSUS $142 MILLION.

headline: NVIDIA Says Current Qtr Impacted By $57 Mln In Charges Related To Architecture Components, Chips
description: Nov 15 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA-CURRENT QUARTER IMPACTED BY $57 MILLION IN CHARGES RELATED TO ARCHITECTURE COMPONENTS, CHIPS AFTER SHARP FALL-OFF IN CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING DEMAND - SEC FILING.NVIDIA - PC OEM REVENUE IN QUARTER DECREASED BY ALMOST 40% DRIVEN BY LOWER DEMAND FOR GPU PRODUCTS TARGETED FOR USE IN CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING.NVIDIA - INVENTORY PROVISIONS TOTALED $70 MILLION AND $14 MILLION FOR THE THIRD QUARTER OF FISCAL YEARS 2019 AND 2018, RESPECTIVELY.NVIDIA - SALES OF INVENTORY THAT WAS PREVIOUSLY WRITTEN-OFF OR WRITTEN-DOWN TOTALED $13 MILLION & $6 MILLION FOR Q3 OF FISCAL YEARS 2019 & 2018, RESPECTIVELY.NVIDIA-NET EFFECT ON QTRLY GROSS MARGIN FROM INVENTORY PROVISIONS, SALES OF INVENTORY PREVIOUSLY WRITTEN-OFF/WRITTEN-DOWN WAS UNFAVORABLE IMPACT OF 1.8%.

headline: NVIDIA Announces Financial Results For Third Quarter Fiscal 2019
description: Nov 15 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2019.Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.84.Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.97.Q3 REVENUE $3.18 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $3.24 BILLION.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.71 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S.NVIDIA INTENDS TO RETURN AN ADDITIONAL $3 BILLION TO SHAREHOLDERS BY END OF FISCAL 2020.Q4 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $2.70 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS 2 PERCENT.NVIDIA INTENDS TO RETURN AN ADDITIONAL $3 BILLION TO SHAREHOLDERS BY END OF FISCAL 2020, WHICH MAY BEGIN IN Q4 OF FISCAL 2019.Q4 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 62.3 PERCENT AND 62.5 PERCENT, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS..QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN 60.4 PERCENT VERSUS 59.5 PERCENT REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND RAISED 7 PERCENT TO $0.16 PER SHARE.QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 61.0 PERCENT VERSUS 59.7 PERCENT REPORTED LAST YEAR.IN NOVEMBER 2018, BOARD OF DIRECTORS AUTHORIZED AN ADDITIONAL $7 BILLION UNDER COMPANY'S SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM."OUR NEAR-TERM RESULTS REFLECT EXCESS CHANNEL INVENTORY POST THE CRYPTO-CURRENCY BOOM, WHICH WILL BE CORRECTED".QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE $2,774 MILLION VERSUS $2,217 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE $172 MILLION VERSUS $144 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.

headline: Nvidia updates financial guidance for fourth quarter of fiscal year 2019
description: Jan 28 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA UPDATES FINANCIAL GUIDANCE FOR FOURTH QUARTER OF FISCAL YEAR 2019.Q4 REVENUE EXPECTED TO BE $2.20 BILLION VERSUS PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF $2.70 BILLION.GAMING AND DATACENTER REVENUE BELOW COMPANY'S EXPECTATIONS.FOR Q4, EXPECTS ITS GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN TO BE IMPACTED BY APPROXIMATELY $120 MILLION IN CHARGES.UPDATED GUIDANCE FOR Q4 OF FISCAL YEAR 2019, REFLECTING WEAKER THAN FORECASTED SALES OF ITS GAMING AND DATACENTER PLATFORMS.NVIDIA - IN DATACENTER, DESPITE NEAR-TERM HEADWINDS, BELIEVES ITS COMPETITIVE POSITION IS INTACT.."Q4 WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY, UNUSUALLY TURBULENT, AND DISAPPOINTING QUARTER".NVIDIA - IN GAMING DURING Q4, DETERIORATING MACROECONOMIC CONDITIONS, PARTICULARLY IN CHINA, IMPACTED CONSUMER DEMAND FOR NVIDIA GAMING GPUS.SALES OF CERTAIN HIGH-END GPUS USING NVIDIA'S NEW TURING ARCHITECTURE WERE LOWER THAN EXPECTED IN Q4.Q4 REVENUE VIEW $2.70 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.NVIDIA - IN DATACENTER, A NUMBER OF DEALS IN CO'S FORECAST DID NOT CLOSE IN LAST MONTH OF QUARTER AS CUSTOMERS SHIFTED TO A MORE CAUTIOUS APPROACH.SEES Q4 GAAP GROSS MARGIN OF 55.0 PCT, PLUS OR MINUS 100 BPS.SEES Q4 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 56.0 PCT, PLUS OR MINUS 100 BPS.

headline: Nvidia Reports Qtrly GPU Business Revenue Of $1.98 Bln, Down 20 Pct
description: Feb 14 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE WAS $1.98 BILLION, DOWN 20 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE WAS $163 MILLION, UP 23 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER AND DOWN 5 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY..NVIDIA CORP - INVENTORY AT END OF QUARTER WAS $1.57 BILLION, UP FROM $1.42 BILLION IN PRIOR QUARTER AND UP FROM $796 MILLION A YEAR EARLIER.NVIDIA CORP - FOR Q1 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $150 MILLION TO $170 MILLION.NVIDIA CORP - SEQUENTIAL DECLINE IN DATACENTER REVENUE IN QUARTER "REFLECTS A BROAD-BASED SLOWDOWN ACROSS OUR CUSTOMERS. ".NVIDIA CORP - YEAR-ON-YEAR DECREASE IN QTRLY OEM AND IP REVENUE PRIMARILY DUE TO ABSENCE OF CRYPTO-CURRENCY MINING GPU SALES.

headline: NVIDIA Q4 non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.80
description: Feb 14 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2019.Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.92.Q4 REVENUE $2.21 BILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $2.2 BILLION.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.75 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.80.COMBINATION OF POST-CRYPTO EXCESS CHANNEL INVENTORY AND RECENT DETERIORATING END-MARKET CONDITIONS DROVE A DISAPPOINTING QUARTER.INTENDS TO RETURN $2.30 BILLION BY END OF FISCAL 2020, THROUGH COMBINATION OF SHARE REPURCHASES AND CASH DIVIDENDS.FOR Q1 OF FISCAL 2020, REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $2.20 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS 2 PERCENT.Q1 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 58.8 PERCENT AND 59.0 PERCENT, RESPECTIVELY.FOR Q1, GAAP AND NON-GAAP OPERATING EXPENSES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $930 MILLION AND $755 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY.FOR FISCAL 2020, REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE FLAT TO DOWN SLIGHTLY.QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN 54.7 PERCENT VERSUS 61.9 PERCENT.FOR Q1, GAAP AND NON-GAAP OTHER INCOME AND EXPENSE ARE BOTH EXPECTED TO BE INCOME OF APPROXIMATELY $20 MILLION.QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 56.0 PERCENT VERSUS 62.1 PERCENT.WILL PAY ITS NEXT QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.16 PER SHARE ON MARCH 22, 2019.Q1 REVENUE VIEW $2.28 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.FY2020 REVENUE VIEW $10.85 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

description: May 16 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE WAS $166 MILLION, UP 14 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY DATA CENTER REVENUE WAS $634 MILLION, DOWN 10 PERCENT FROM A YEAR AGO.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY GAMING REVENUE WAS $1.05 BILLION, DOWN 39 PERCENT FROM A YEAR AGO AND UP 11 PERCENT SEQUENTIALLY..NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE WAS $2.02 BILLION, DOWN 27 PERCENT FROM A YEAR EARLIER.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY GAMING REVENUE Y-0-Y DECREASE REFLECTS DECLINE IN SHIPMENTS OF GAMING GPUS AND SOC MODULES FOR GAMING PLATFORMS.NVIDIA CORP - INVENTORY AT QUARTER-END $1.43 BILLION, DOWN FROM $1.57 BILLION IN THE PRIOR QUARTER.NVIDIA CORP - Q2 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $120 MILLION TO $140 MILLION.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY DATA CENTER REVENUE Y-O-Y DECLINE REFLECTS SLOWDOWN IN PURCHASES BY CERTAIN HYPERSCALE AND ENTERPRISE CUSTOMERS.NVIDIA CORP - QTRLY DATA CENTER REVENUE DOWN 10% PRIMARILY REFLECTING SLOWDOWN IN PURCHASES BY CERTAIN HYPERSCALE AND ENTERPRISE CUSTOMERS.NVIDIA - QTRLY GPU BUSINESS REVENUE DOWN 27% REFLECTS DECLINES IN GAMING, DATA CENTER REVENUE & ABSENCE OF $289 MILLION OF OEM REVENUE FROM CMP.

description: Nov 14 (Reuters) - Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2020.Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.78.Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.45.Q3 REVENUE $3.01 BILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $2.91 BILLION.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $1.57 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q4 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $2.95 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS 2 PERCENT.QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN 63.6% VERSUS 60.4% REPORTED LAST YEAR.Q4 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS EXPECTED TO BE 64.1 PERCENT AND 64.5 PERCENT, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS.QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 64.1% VERSUS 61.0% REPORTED LAST YEAR.Q4 GAAP AND NON-GAAP OPERATING EXPENSES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $1.02 BILLION AND $805 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY.Q4 GAAP AND NON-GAAP OTHER INCOME AND EXPENSE ARE BOTH EXPECTED TO BE INCOME OF APPROXIMATELY $25 MILLION..Q4 REVENUE VIEW $3.06 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.SAYS "OUR GAMING BUSINESS AND DEMAND FROM HYPERSCALE CUSTOMERS POWERED Q3'S RESULTS".WILL RETURN TO REPURCHASING ITS STOCK AFTER CLOSING ACQUISITION OF MELLANOX TECHNOLOGIES.WILL PAY ITS NEXT QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.16 PER SHARE ON DEC. 20, 2019, TO ALL SHAREHOLDERS OF RECORD ON NOV. 29, 2019.BELIEVES MELLANOX DEAL CLOSING WILL LIKELY OCCUR IN EARLY PART OF CALENDAR 2020.Q4 REVENUE VIEW $3.06 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.DISCUSSIONS REGARDING MELLANOX DEAL WITH EU AND CHINA REGULATORY BODIES ARE PROGRESSING.CLOSING THE ACQUISITION IS POSSIBLE BY END OF THIS CALENDAR YEAR.

headline: Nvidia Says To Acquire Arm For $40 Billion
description: Sept 13 (Reuters) - Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>::TO ACQUIRE ARM FOR $40 BILLION, CREATING WORLD'S PREMIER COMPUTING COMPANY FOR THE AGE OF AI.TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO NVIDIA'S NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN AND NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE.DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT UNDER WHICH NVIDIA WILL ACQUIRE ARM LIMITED FROM SBG ,SOFTBANK VISION FUND  IN A DEAL VALUED AT $40 BILLION.ARM WILL REMAIN HEADQUARTERED IN CAMBRIDGE.WILL PAY TO SOFTBANK A TOTAL OF $21.5 BILLION IN NVIDIA COMMON STOCK AND $12 BILLION IN CASH, WHICH INCLUDES $2 BILLION PAYABLE AT SIGNING.AS PART OF NVIDIA, ARM WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE ITS OPEN-LICENSING MODEL.WILL ALSO ISSUE $1.5 BILLION IN EQUITY TO ARM EMPLOYEES.TRANSACTION DOES NOT INCLUDE ARM'S IOT SERVICES GROUP.FOLLOWING CLOSING OF TRANSACTION, NVIDIA INTENDS TO RETAIN NAME AND STRONG BRAND IDENTITY OF ARM.NUMBER OF NVIDIA SHARES TO BE ISSUED AT CLOSING IS 44.3 MILLION.COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE IN APPROXIMATELY 18 MONTHS.SOFTBANK AND ARM ARE FULLY COMMITTED TO SATISFYING UNDERTAKINGS MADE BY SOFTBANK WHEN IT ACQUIRED ARM IN 2016 SCHEDULED TO COMPLETE IN SEPT 2021.

headline: Nvidia Announces Q1 Fiscal 2022 Revenue Tracking Above Outlook
description: April 12 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2022 REVENUE TRACKING ABOVE OUTLOOK.NVIDIA CORP - Q1 TOTAL REVENUE IS TRACKING ABOVE THE $5.30 BILLION OUTLOOK PROVIDED DURING OUR FISCAL YEAR-END EARNINGS CALL.NVIDIA CORP - EXPERIENCING BROAD-BASED STRENGTH, WITH ALL MARKET PLATFORMS DRIVING UPSIDE TO INITIAL OUTLOOK.NVIDIA CORP - WITHIN DATA CENTER WE HAVE GOOD VISIBILITY, AND WE EXPECT ANOTHER STRONG YEAR.NVIDIA CORP - OVERALL DEMAND REMAINS VERY STRONG & CONTINUES TO EXCEED SUPPLY WHILE CHANNEL INVENTORIES REMAIN QUITE LEAN.NVIDIA - EGX PLATFORM HAS STRONG MOMENTUM, AND WE EXPECT THIS WILL DRIVE INCREASED REVENUE FROM ENTERPRISE AND EDGE COMPUTING DEPLOYMENTS IN H2.NVIDIA CORP - EXPECT DEMAND TO CONTINUE TO EXCEED SUPPLY FOR MUCH OF THIS YEAR.NVIDIA CORP - BELIEVE WE WILL HAVE SUFFICIENT SUPPLY TO SUPPORT SEQUENTIAL GROWTH BEYOND Q1.NVIDIA - RAISED Q1 REVENUE ESTIMATE FOR NEW CMP PRODUCT FOR INDUSTRIAL-SCALE CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING TO $150 MILLION, UP FROM $50 MILLION PREVIOUSLY EXPECTED.

headline: SoftBank CEO Son says 'we are in the middle of a blizzard'
description: Nov 8 (Reuters) - :SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS 'WE ARE IN THE MIDDLE OF A BLIZZARD'.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS ALIBABA IS BIGGEST DRAG ON NET ASSET VALUE.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS VISION FUND IS STEADILY INCREASING AS A PROPORTION OF NET ASSET VALUE.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS WE ARE NOT PROUD OF VISION FUND'S QUARTERLY PERFORMANCE.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS IF YOU LOOK AT LIFETIME GAINS OF VISION FUND IT IS SUCCESSFUL.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS CHINA IS THE ONLY REGION DRIVING VISION FUND LOSSES DURING THE QUARTER.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS EVEN IN THE BLIZZARD I CAN SEE A NEW GREEN SPROUT.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS WE ARE MAKING STEADY STEPS TO LAY DOUBLE THE NUMBER OF 'GOLDEN EGGS' COMPARED TO LAST YEAR.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS SHARE BUYBACK LETS US TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE CONGLOMERATE DISCOUNT AS SHAREHOLDERS.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS WE HAD A HEATED DISCUSSION ABOUT THE BUYBACK AT THE BOARD MEETING.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS I AM EXCITED TO BE BUYING BACK SHARES AS A SHAREHOLDER.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS WE MAY NOT REACH 1 TRLN YEN IN ONE YEAR IN TERMS OF REPURCHASES.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS WE WANT TO INCREASE THE NUMBER OF INVESTMENTS IN JAPANESE COMPANIES.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS NUMBER OF JAPANESE COMPANIES IN OUR PIPELINE IS VERY SMALL.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS HOPE TO SEE MORE AI UNICORNS IN JAPAN.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS WE ARE NOT MARKETING VF2 TO EXTERNAL INVESTORS.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS I STILL BELIEVE ARM DEAL WILL PASS REGULATORY REVIEW.SOFTBANK CEO SON SAYS I HAVE ALREADY COMMITTED TO SVF2 BUT WE ARE STILL ADJUSTING FOR OTHER MEMBERS.

headline: NVIDIA Announces Financial Results For First Quarter Fiscal 2023
description: May 25 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2023.Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.36.Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.64.Q1 REVENUE ROSE 46 PERCENT TO $8.29 BILLION.NVIDIA - ON MAY 23, BOARD INCREASED & EXTENDED SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM TO REPURCHASE ADDITIONAL COMMON STOCK UP TO TOTAL OF $15 BILLION THROUGH DEC 2023.FIRST-QUARTER DATA CENTER REVENUE WAS A RECORD $3.75 BILLION, UP 83% FROM A YEAR AGO.Q2 OF FISCAL 2023 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $8.10 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS 2%.FIRST-QUARTER GAMING  REVENUE WAS $3.62 BILLION, UP 31% FROM A YEAR AGO AND UP 6% FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER.Q2 REVENUE OUTLOOK INCLUDES AN ESTIMATED REDUCTION OF APPROXIMATELY $500 MILLION RELATING TO RUSSIA AND COVID LOCKDOWNS IN CHINA.FIRST-QUARTER AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE WAS $138 MILLION, DOWN 10% FROM A YEAR AGO AND UP 10% FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER.Q2 OF FISCAL 2023 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 65.1% AND 67.1%, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS.QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN 65.5%.QTRLY NON- GAAP GROSS MARGIN 67.1%.Q1 REVENUE VIEW $8.12 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q2 REVENUE VIEW $8.45 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

headline: Nvidia Announces Financial Results For Second Quarter Fiscal 2023
description: Aug 24 (Reuters) - Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2023.QUARTERLY REVENUE OF $6.70 BILLION, UP 3% FROM A YEAR AGO.QTRLY DATA CENTER REVENUE OF $3.81 BILLION, UP 61% FROM A YEAR AGO.SEES Q3 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $5.90 BILLION, PLUS OR MINUS 2%.QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.26.SEES Q3 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 62.4% AND 65.0%, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS.QTRLY  ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.51.QTRLY GAAP GROSS MARGIN 43.5%.QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 45.9%.SECOND-QUARTER AUTOMOTIVE REVENUE WAS $220 MILLION, UP 45% FROM A YEAR AGO AND UP 59% FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER..SECOND-QUARTER  GAMING REVENUE WAS $2.04 BILLION, DOWN 33% FROM A YEAR AGO AND DOWN 44% FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER.QTRLY REVENUE WAS LOWER THAN OUR  OUTLOOK ISSUED IN MAY PRIMARILY DUE TO WEAKER GAMING REVENUE.QTRLY  DATA CENTER REVENUE WAS SOMEWHAT SHORT OF  OUR EXPECTATIONS, AS IT WAS IMPACTED BY SUPPLY CHAIN DISRUPTIONS.GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN DECREASES IN QUARTER WERE PRIMARILY DUE TO A $1.34 BILLION CHARGE.NVIDIA - QTRLY  GAAP OPERATING EXPENSE INCLUDES A $1.35 BILLION ACQUISITION TERMINATION CHARGE RELATED TO THE ARM  TRANSACTION IN THE PRIOR QUARTER.$1.34 BILLION CHARGE IN QUARTER COMPRISED OF $1.22 BILLION FOR INVENTORY AND RELATED RESERVES AND $122 MILLION FOR WARRANTY RESERVES.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.26, REVENUE VIEW $8.10 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q3 REVENUE VIEW $6.95 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

headline: Nvidia Announces Financial Results For Fourth Quarter And Fiscal 2023
description: Feb 22 (Reuters) - Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2023.DATA CENTER FOURTH-QUARTER REVENUE WAS $3.62 BILLION, UP 11% FROM A YEAR AGO.Q1 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 64.1% AND 66.5%, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.81, REVENUE VIEW $6.01 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q1 REVENUE VIEW $6.33 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

headline: Nvidia Announces Financial Results For First Quarter Fiscal 2024
description: NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2024.NVIDIA CORP: SEES Q2 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO BE 68.6% AND 70.0%, RESPECTIVELY, PLUS OR MINUS 50 BASIS POINTS.NVIDIA CORP- QTRLY DATA CENTER REVENUE WAS A RECORD $4.28 BILLION, UP 14%.NVIDIA CORP: "COMPUTER INDUSTRY IS GOING THROUGH TWO SIMULTANEOUS TRANSITIONS - ACCELERATED COMPUTING AND GENERATIVE AI".NVIDIA CORP: WE ARE SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASING OUR SUPPLY TO MEET SURGING DEMAND FOR ENTIRE DATA CENTER FAMILY OF PRODUCTS.

headline: Nvidia CFO Says Aware Of Reports That The U.S. Considering Further Controls That May Restrict Exports Of Our A800 And H800 Products To China
description: June 28 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CFO: AWARE OF REPORTS THAT THE U.S. CONSIDERING FURTHER CONTROLS THAT MAY RESTRICT EXPORTS OF OUR A800 AND H800 PRODUCTS TO CHINA.NVIDIA CFO SAYS DO NOT ANTICIPATE SUCH ADDITIONAL RESTRICTIONS FROM US , IF ADOPTED, WOULD HAVE AN IMMEDIATE MATERIAL IMPACT ON OUR FINANCIAL RESULTS.NVIDIA CFO - OVER LONG-TERM, RESTRICTIONS PROHIBITING SALE OF DATACENTER GPUS TO CHINA WOULD IMPACT FUTURE BUSINESS FINANCIAL RESULTS.

headline: Jio Platforms Teams With Nvidia To Bring AI Cloud Infrastructure To India - Statement
description: Sept 8 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::JIO PLATFORMS TEAMS WITH NVIDIA TO BRING AI CLOUD INFRASTRUCTURE TO INDIA - STATEMENT.JIO PLATFORMS:  NEW INFRASTRUCTURE WILL SPEED UP WIDE RANGE OF INDIA’S KEY INITIATIVES AND AI PROJECTS.JIO PLATFORMS:  NVIDIA WILL PROVIDE JIO WITH END-TO-END AI SUPERCOMPUTER TECHNOLOGIES.JIO PLATFORMS:  JIO WILL MANAGE AND MAINTAIN THE AI CLOUD INFRASTRUCTURE AND OVERSEE CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT AND ACCESS.

headline: Nvidia Corp- Licensing Requirement Includes Future Nvidia Integrated Circuits, Boards, Or Systems Classified With Eccn 3A090 Or 4A090
description: Oct 17 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA CORP- LICENSING REQUIREMENT INCLUDES FUTURE NVIDIA INTEGRATED CIRCUITS, BOARDS, OR SYSTEMS CLASSIFIED WITH ECCN 3A090 OR 4A090.NVIDIA CORP - DO NOT ANTICIPATE THAT ADDITIONAL RESTRICTIONS WILL HAVE A NEAR-TERM MEANINGFUL IMPACT ON OUR FINANCIAL RESULTS.NVIDIA CORP: DO NOT ANTICIPATE THAT ADDITIONAL RESTRICTIONS WILL HAVE A NEAR-TERM MEANINGFUL IMPACT ON OUR FINANCIAL RESULTS.NVIDIA CORP- LICENSING REQUIREMENT MAY IMPACT ABILITY TO COMPLETE DEVELOPMENT OF PRODUCTS IN TIMELY MANNER.NVIDIA CORP -  LICENSING REQUIREMENT MAY IMPACT COMPANY'S ABILITY TO SUPPORT EXISTING CUSTOMERS OF COVERED PRODUCTS.NVIDIA CORP: TO EXTENT THAT A CUSTOMER REQUIRES PRODUCTS COVERED BY NEW LICENSING REQUIREMENTS, COMPANY MAY SEEK A LICENSE FOR CUSTOMER.NVIDIA CORP-  LICENSING REQUIREMENT MAY REQUIRE COMPANY TO TRANSITION CERTAIN OPERATIONS OUT OF ONE OR MORE OF IDENTIFIED COUNTRIES.NVIDIA CORP - LICENSING LICENSING REQUIREMENT MAY IMPACT COMPANY'S ABILITY TO SUPPLY CUSTOMERS OF COVERED PRODUCTS OUTSIDE IMPACTED REGIONS.NVIDIA CORP -  LICENSING REQUIREMENT MAY REQUIRE COMPANY TO TRANSITION CERTAIN OPERATIONS OUT OF ONE OR MORE OF IDENTIFIED COUNTRIES.

headline: Cadence Design Systems CEO Anirudh Devgan Says Will Deepen Partnership With Nvidia, Extend It To Millennium Multi-Physics Supercomputer - Conf Call
description: Feb 12 (Reuters) - Cadence Design Systems Inc <CDNS.O>::CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS CEO ANIRUDH DEVGAN SAYS WILL DEEPEN PARTNERSHIP WITH NVIDIA, EXTEND IT TO MILLENNIUM MULTI-PHYSICS SUPERCOMPUTER - CONF CALL.CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS CEO SAYS HARDWARE FAMILY ADDED 26 NEW AND OVER 110 REPEAT CUSTOMERS DURING THE YEAR.CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS CFO SAYS Q1 OUTLOOK AT THE ASSUMES AN UP-FRONT REVENUE MIX OF ABOUT 14%.CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS EXPECTS CHINA SALES TO BE FLAT TO SLIGHTLY DOWN FOR FULL YEAR.CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS SAYS ABOUT 1,000 EXTRA STAFF IN 2024.Further company coverage: CDNS.O. headline: Nvidia Announces Financial Results For First Quarter Fiscal 2025
description: May 22 (Reuters) - NVIDIA Corp <NVDA.O>::NVIDIA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2025.QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND RAISED 150% TO $0.01 PER SHARE ON A POST-SPLIT BASIS.QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND RAISED 150% TO $0.01 PER SHARE ON A POST-SPLIT BASIS.TEN-FOR-ONE FORWARD STOCK SPLIT EFFECTIVE JUNE 7, 2024.SEES Q2 GAAP AND NON-GAAP GROSS MARGINS EXPECTED TO BE 74.8% AND 75.5%.NVIDIA IS INCREASING ITS QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND BY 150% FROM $0.04 PER SHARE TO $0.10 PER SHARE OF COMMON STOCK.SEES FULL YEAR GROSS MARGINS EXPECTED TO BE IN MID-70% RANGE.TRADING IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE ON A SPLIT-ADJUSTED BASIS AT MARKET OPEN ON MONDAY, JUNE 10, 2024.DATA CENTER GROWTH WAS FUELED BY STRONG AND ACCELERATING DEMAND FOR GENERATIVE AI TRAINING AND INFERENCE ON HOPPER PLATFORM.BLACKWELL PLATFORM IS IN FULL PRODUCTION.

headline: Samsung Electronics Says HBM Shipments To Double In 2025 From 2024
description: Jan 31 (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics Co Ltd <005930.KS>::SINCE TRUMP ADMINISTRATION'S SECOND TERM, SHIFTING POLICITES, FLUCTUATIONS IN INTEREST RATES AND INFLATION ARE EXPECTED TO CREATE RANGE OF UNCERTAINTIES AND WEIGH ON CONSUMER SENTIMENT.Q4 SMARTPHONE SHIPMENTS 52 MILLION UNITS.HBM SHIPMENTS TO DOUBLE IN 2025, FROM 2024.TO MASS-PRODUCE FIRST-GENERATION 2 NM CHIPS IN 2025.Further company coverage: 005930.KS. (Reporting by Joyce Lee). ((JungYoon.Lee@thomsonreuters.com;)).
